page.title: 20IN CONCLUSION
page.content: This survey was carried out by the{ {FIRST FORM}pupils of{MONMOUTH SCHOOL} in{JUNE and early JULY 1985.}A field day was used in order to collect the land cover and amenities data. As can be seen from the results the area lacked variety! A large number of people and organisations helped with supplying information on which the text data was based. Visits were arranged and data was slowly collected. A hearty {"thank {you"}to all who gave their expertise and advice. {The DOMESDAY PROJECT}turned out to be a very interesting experience.
